snippet: The plant’s operator, the Tokyo Electric Power Company, said that just over three quarts of water was believed to have leaked from the plant’s No. 3 storage pool.
abstract: Tokyo Electric Power Company reports small toxic leak at stricken Fukushima nuclear plant, two days after reporting much larger leak from similar storage pool; raises new public concerns about company’s ability to safely manage plant.
lead_paragraph: The plant’s operator, the Tokyo Electric Power Company, said that just over three quarts of water was believed to have leaked from the plant’s No. 3 storage pool.

headline.seo: Small Toxic Leak Is Reported at Fukushima Nuclear Plant
headline.main: Small Leak Is Reported at Fukushima Nuclear Plant
headline.print_headline: Small Leak Is Reported At Fukushima
